QuestData.Title: The Conquest Pit: Blood and Metal
QuestData.Description: It's nice to have a real fighter around these parts... we'd only had prisoners and caged beasts for the past few weeks. The people get bored, ya know?$B$BAnyhow, your next challenge is a genuine iron golem stolen from the depths of Thor Modan... think you can swing it?
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Rustblood inside the Conquest Pit and speak to Bookie Vel'jen for a reward.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Bookie Vel'jen at Conquest Hold in Grizzly Hills.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's not over until you or the metal heap tips over, friend!
QuestData.RewardText: My heart nearly skipped a beat there! Thought that mound of metal was gonna get ya, mon!
